factions.description: Which factions this entity belongs to.

targeting_node.description: [string]Node used for line of sight/aiming at entity.

targeting_ignored_unit_paths.description: [string]Ignored units for line of sight/aiming checks.

half_width.description: Distance from which an enemy can attack you from the side.

half_forward_size.description: Distance from which an enemy can attack you from the front or back.

spawn_influence_radius.description: Radius of influence of this entity used when spawning other entities nearby. Prevents spawning unit on top of each other

spawn_influence.description: How strong the influence of this entity is around the influence radius when spawning other entities nearby. Prevents spawning unit on top of each other

complex_targeting_nodes.description: [string]Multiple nodes specified for larger targets, such as vehicles
